text.sentence: Hi! Has Mum given you any gift ideas for her birthday/Christmas?
Karin The information in this e-mail is confidential and may be legally privileged.
It is intended solely for the addressee.
Access by any other person to this e-mail is not authorized.
If you are not the intended recipient, please delete this e-mail.
Any disclosure of this e-mail or of the parties to it, any copying, distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it is prohibited, and may be unlawful.
No -- she keeps promising to, but I do not have any yet.
We should sit her down after Thanksgiving dinner and help her make a list of what she needs.
I only need to shop for her and Grayson; I have everyone else covered!
I have been a shoppin' fool!
What are your travel plans?
We can give you ideas for bug at Thanksgiving.
The 2 specific toys that i wanted for her have been purchased by aqua grandma, but she needs some more.
Her old toys are becoming too babyish for her.
I haven't had the time to scout out the toy departments yet.
One thing that would be good is if someone could see if that Sesame Street album exists - the one that I had.
I am progressing somewhat on her list, but items are very non-specific.
We will probably arrive in Austin on Thursday morning and stay 2 nights.
I heard that Mems is arriving on Wed.
Is she actually going to drive?
